about_the_game:
Vistas 2 Book

This vistas 2 book unlocks 20 additional levels for Coloring Pixels! As with the previous Vistas book, this DLC offers more of the scenery, landscapes, and forests you love!

Contents

The Vistas 2 book unlocks the following images:
  • Jungle - 97x97
  • Pyramid - 100x50
  • Moonlight - 106x107
  • Tree Tops - 108x107
  • Desert - 112x112
  • River - 114x111
  • Stream - 114xx114
  • Forest Path - 122x124
  • Hills - 136x78
  • Park - 136x78
  • Seaside - 136x78
  • Seasons - 136x78
  • Starlight - 143x143
  • Mt Fuji - 144x141
  • Snow Tree - 146x148
  • River Side View - 149x148
  • Forest - 150x96
  • Still Lake - 153x123
  • Island - 250x100
  • Windy Field - 320x180

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu
  • Processor: Intel i3
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX 10.11
  • Processor: Intel i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound

name: Coloring Pixels - Vistas Pack 2

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 8.1
  • Processor: Intel i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX960
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i7 7700k
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX970
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound
